extension.summary: Librespot: use Spotify Connect through LibreELEC
extension.description: Librespot (2017-02-22 - 6a0657fec6f887fda8276e5c70317dec887b90dd) plays Spotify through LibreELEC using the opensource librespot library and, using a Spotify app as a remote.
